sentences.en: By C's prodigality, that which would have been consumed with a return , is consumed without return.
sentences.cn: 由于丙的浪费, 本来在消费时能得到收益的资金被白白浪费掉了.

sentences.en: Capitals are increased by parsimony, and diminished by prodigality and misconduct.
sentences.cn: 节俭使资本增长, 挥霍和运用不当使资本减少.

sentences.en: Laughter is easier minute by minute, spilled with prodigality, tipped out at a cheerful word.
sentences.cn: 笑声每时每刻都变得越来越容易, 毫无节制地倾泻出来,只要一句笑话就会引起哄然大笑.

sentences.en: Laughter is easier minute by minute, spilled with prodigality.
sentences.cn: 笑声每时每刻都变得越来越容易, 毫无节制地倾泻出来.

sentences.en: The prodigality of the sea, ie in providing fish.
The sleeping fox catches no poulty, Idleness is the greatest prodigality.
sentences.cn: 睡觉的狐狸捉不到家禽, 懒惰是最大的消费.
